taskbody.prereq: The license activation requires an internet connection.

step.cmd: Click the License activation shortcut in the operating system Start menu.
step.stepresult: The Bricsys License Manager - Activate Network License dialog box opens.

step.cmd: Enter the new network license in the License Key field and click OK.
Click the License server administration shortcut in the operating system Start menu to open the Reprise License Server Administration.
Click the Reread/Restart Servers option in the left menu.
